Configuration.Name: Alma Primo Definitive Catalog Search
Configuration.Author: Atlas Systems
Configuration.Description: Catalog Search and Import Addon that uses Alma as the catalog and Primo or Primo VE as the discovery layer.

Setting.name: CatalogURL
Setting.Description: The base URL that the query strings are appended to.

Setting.name: AutoSearch
Setting.Description: Defines whether the search should be automatically performed when the form opens.

Setting.name: RemoveTrailingSpecialCharacters
Setting.Description: Defines whether to remove trailing special characters on import or not.

Setting.name: AvailableSearchTypes
Setting.Description: The types of searches your catalog supports (e.g. Title, Author, Call Number, Catalog Number)

Setting.name: SearchPriorityList
Setting.Description: The fields that should be searched on, in order of search priority. Each field in the string will be checked for a valid corresponding search value in the request, and the first search type with a valid corresponding value will be used.

Setting.name: AutoRetrieveItems
Setting.Description: Defines whether or not the addon should automatically retrieve items related to a record being viewed.

Setting.name: AlmaAPIURL
Setting.Description: The URL to the Alma API

Setting.name: AlmaAPIKey
Setting.Description: API key used for interacting with the Alma API.

Setting.name: PrimoSiteCode
Setting.Description: The code that identifies the site in Primo Deep Links. Ex: vid={PrimoSiteCode}

Setting.name: IdSuffix
Setting.Description: The last four digits of MMS IDs and IE IDs for your institution.
